They wanted to be “brainwashed"; they wanted to be told that their mighty army didn't lose WWI but instead were stabbed in the back by Jews and Communists who betrayed the men at the front. They wanted to be told that that their savings that had evaporated in the hyperinflation was the fault of Jewish bankers like the Rothschilds The Allies didn't help by treating the Versailles ‘negotiations’ as a chance to put Germany on trial, excluding them from the talks until the end when the German delegation were wheeled in to hear the judgement. Germany was held solely responsible for the War despite Britain, France and Russia being equally keen to show the Hun who's in charge, a demilitarized the Rhineland, which France invaded the first chance it got, confiscation of East Prussia for the re-establishment of Poland and the transfer of the coal producing areas of Silesia and the Saar Basin to Poland and France and massive reparations to the victors, which France continued to enforce long after the US and UK had accepted that Germany was incapable of paying particularly as they had no coal to export. They wanted someone to explain to them why they had Soviet style councils running the country and civil war in the streets Anyone could have stood on a soap box and told them it was the Communists, within which Jews were over represented, that betrayed them and the Treaty of Versailles which had robbed the country of it's means to recover and imposed the chaotic Weimar Republic on them and the people would listen And they did, unfortunately
